com.google.android.filament

类 Engine.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.filament.Engine.Builder
  • 封闭类:
    Engine

    public static class Engine.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs Engine objects using a builder pattern.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Builder()

        public Builder()

    • 方法详细资料

      • backend

        public Engine.Builder backend(Engine.Backend backend)
        Sets the Engine.Backend for the Engine.
        参数:
        backend - Driver backend to use
        返回:
        A reference to this Builder for chaining calls.

      • sharedContext

        public Engine.Builder sharedContext(java.lang.Object sharedContext)
        Sets a sharedContext for the Engine.
        参数:
        sharedContext - A platform-dependant OpenGL context used as a shared context when creating filament's internal context. On Android this parameter must be an instance of android.opengl.EGLContext.
        返回:
        A reference to this Builder for chaining calls.

      • config

        public Engine.Builder config(Engine.Config config)
        Configure the Engine with custom parameters.
        参数:
        config - A Engine.Config object
        返回:
        A reference to this Builder for chaining calls.

      • featureLevel

        public Engine.Builder featureLevel(Engine.FeatureLevel featureLevel)
        Sets the initial featureLevel for the Engine.
        参数:
        featureLevel - The feature level at which initialize Filament.
        返回:
        A reference to this Builder for chaining calls.

      • paused

        public Engine.Builder paused(boolean paused)
        Sets the initial paused state of the rendering thread.

        Warning: This is an experimental API. See Engine.setPaused(boolean) for caveats.

        参数:
        paused - Whether to start the rendering thread paused.
        返回:
        A reference to this Builder for chaining calls.

      • build

        public Engine build()
        Creates an instance of Engine
        返回:
        A newly created Engine, or null if the GPU driver couldn't be initialized, for instance if it doesn't support the right version of OpenGL or OpenGL ES.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - can be thrown if there isn't enough memory to allocate the command buffer.
